Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Forrest Miller
Reviews.Content: no set or programing, up worked right out of the box,does not work in dark, but other than that works great

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: Works ok, but menu and setup is confusing. The little remote has a  couple of functioning keys and no instructions. Good Luck!

ProductInfo.Features:
AC Adapter PRO Hidden Camera with DVR- All-in-One video surveillance system inside an ordinary looking AC Power Adapter
Built-in Recording DVR, Motion-Activated Recording, Time/Date Stamp on Recorded Video Files
Plug&play; technology for easy use; no complicated installation or messy wiring
Quickly and Easily backup video recordings from you Micro SD Card; simply insert the Micro SD Card into your PC's Memory Card slot to quickly transfer and store video
Overwrite feature means you'll never run out of memory; Record up to 32 hours of surveillance footage onto a single Micro SD Card
ProductInfo.Name: AC Adapter Hidden Camera PRO by Brickhouse Security
